entries.title: Deepfaked: ‘They put my face on a porn video’
entries.description: Campaigner Kate Isaacs describes the horror of seeing her face digitally edited into an adult film.

entries.title: Europe faces tough decisions over nuclear power
entries.description: With high energy prices and disrupted gas supplies, European nations consider more nuclear power plants.

entries.title: Amazon could pay UK shoppers £900m compensation
entries.description: A group-action claim alleges Amazon breached competition law and caused customers to pay higher prices.

entries.title: Amazon workers fail to reach strike threshold in historic UK ballot
entries.description: GMB says it was three votes short of reaching the 50% threshold needed for industrial action.
